articles.description: New Jersey Gov. Phil Murphy (D) explains why he's blaming Walgreens and the federal government for the Garden State’s sluggish vaccine rollout.
articles.content: New Jersey Gov. Phil Murphy (D) blamed Walgreens and the federal government for the Garden State's sluggish vaccine rollout during a Wednesday evening interview on CNBC's "The News with Shepard Smith… [+2188 chars]
